message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more for being the one who comes up with the proposal this round
A slight improvement from my end, hope you'll accept this time!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I still think I deserve more. You're getting a good offer, don't pass it up!
Getting closer to a fair split, let's see if you'll accept this time!
I'm getting a bit frustrated with these lowball offers. I'm willing to give you a better deal, but you're going to have to meet me halfway
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more this time!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of anymore. I'm willing to give you a decent offer, but don't think you're getting away with the better deal
I'm getting closer to a deal, but I still think I can do better. Let's see if you'll meet me in the middle!
I'm getting tired of these low offers. I'm willing to give you a decent deal, but don't think you're getting away with the better end of the deal
I'm getting close to a deal, but I still think I can do better. Let's see if you'll meet me halfway!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of anymore. This is my final offer, take it or leave it
